uryu-ishida.name: Uryū Ishida
uryu-ishida.quote: The man's name was Sôken Ishida. He was my teacher... And my Grandfather. I'm glad Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see this... On my honor as a Quincy... I'm going... To kill you.
uryu-ishida.description: A young man from Karakura Town that claims to be 'The Last Quincy'. He encounters Ichigo Kurosaki after taunting him into a Hollow-slaying contest that quickly escalates. The echoes of his race's past linger in his mind, and forces Uryū to face extreme adversity. Uryū is a Long Range character that makes use of a wide variety of Ranged attacks. He has a Balanced playstyle, and is one of few characters in the game who has a Reawakening. Be wary of Uryū's miniscular Defense, Speed and Power - It's best to avoid attacks and to pick at opponents from a range, making use of Uryū's various techniques to overpower your enemies.

abilities.abilityName: And the victor of this battle is me
abilities.abilityQuote: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor

base.name: Licht Regen
base.description: Uryu fires a rain of arrows into the air and looses them upon his target. By holding the input, the arrow storm fired will last longer.

base.name: Quincy Arrow
base.description: Fires a Heilig Pfiel towards Uryu's opponent. If the arrow hits, Uryu uses Hirenkyaku to teleport towards the opponent, firing a successive barrage of 5 additional Heilig Pfiel arrows.

base.name: Seeleschneider
base.description: Uryu draws his Seeleschneider, holding it in-front of him. If an opponent hits Uryu, he absorbs the hit and counters with a powerful retaliation, followed by a precise Heilig Pfiel.

awakened.name: Ransōtengai Awakening
awakened.description: Uryu manipulates his body through threads of Reiryoku, enhancing his damage output and increasing the amount of Reiatsu he can store.

reawakened.name: Letzt Stile Reawakening
reawakened.description: Uryu snaps one of the prongs of his Sanrei Glove, breaking his commitment to his Grandfather and instilling within him the true power of `The Last Quincy`. Uryu's outfit changes, and his mastery over Reishi is exponentially enhanced. It is currently not known exactly what this Reawakening does to Uryu in regards to gameplay.

kikon.name: Heilig Pfeil
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Uryu draws his bowstring, charging a powerful Heilig Pfeil before loosing it upon his foe in a powerful, precise blast.

kikon.name: Unknown
kikon.description: Alternate Awakened Kikon currently not known.

kikon.name: Letzt Stile: Heilig Pfeil
kikon.description: Whilst Reawakened, Uryu summons a Heilig Pfeil from the surrounding Reishi, notching it on his bow, firing an explosive blast truly worthy of one known as 'The Last Quincy'.

kikon.name: Unknown
kikon.description: Alternate Reawakened Kikon currently not known.

baseCombos.name: Step Quick Attack Combo
